news.title: ‘It used to weigh me down’: UK readers on why they do or don’t carry a wallet
news.summary: Fewer than half of British adults now carry a physical wallet, according to recent research. Digital wallets such as Apple Pay or Google Pay are the default payment method among generation Z and millennials. But many people over the age of 44 still rely on physical debit and credit cards.

news.title: Powering up: how Ethiopia is becoming an unlikely leader in the electric vehicle revolution
news.summary: Ethiopia has become the first country to ban imports of petrol and diesel cars. A new dam brings hopes of cheap green energy to the country.

news.title: MP3 players are making a comeback – I tested 15 to find the best
news.summary: MP3 players are seeing a small resurgence despite the domination of Spotify, Apple Music and the like. Ditch the subscriptions and algorithms of the music streamers with our pick of the best modern digital audio players.
